This hentai tells two stories: Two girls hooking up with and then dating two brothers, and the MCs viewpoint. Without the MC, it’s about teenage girls happily developing their sex lives (and I think it’s really hot). With the MC, it’s a bad tale of a rather meek but mostly normal teen who is getting screwed by his brothers. There is a major plot hole, though, with the MC clearly not on the alert when his brothers showed up, but they clearly had lots of experience and the MC never speaks of it. ……… This is really about a normal kid getting a painfully close look at the privileged lives of popular people. For the reader, there is an extra pain in seeing a kid who plays by the rules being outclassed by people who don’t have to. That’s what a lot of NTR is about: the betrayal of those who break rules and of those who reward them for it. Also for the reader, we get the treat of watching the girls get nasty.
